about_the_game:
Sawdust is a chaotic combination of the tycoon and couch game genres which requires up to 4 players to work together to provide a finely oiled service. Working as a team grab you're nearby sandpaper hammer or saw and get to work creating wooden masterpieces for a wide variety of customers.

Customise

With a wide variety of upgrades for your carpenter/tables/recipes available, you can choose as a team which direction to take your workshop. Focus on gaining new recipes and tables to expand your selection, or take the carpenter upgrade route to become a master crafter.

Endless Mode

Unlock the endless mode for each level to take your craftsmanship to the next level, prove yourselves against the leaderboards to show who is the master crafter

short_description: Sand saw and nail your way through this chaotic couch co-op game for one to four players. Gather your finely-grained team of carpenters and carve out your oak-shaped fortune. Make sure you keep up your production line to keep every customer satisfied.
